en.header: Complete activation of your FOLIO account
en.body:
{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your FOLIO account has been activated.

Your username is {{user.username}}.

To complete activation of your account, please use the following link to create a password for your FOLIO account: visit this link

If you do not create a password within 24 hours of the delivery of this email, then contact your FOLIO Administrator to receive a new create password link.

Regards,

{{institution.name}} FOLIO Administration

{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your request to reset your password has been received.

To reset your password, please visit this link.

NOTE: If you do not reset your password within {{expirationTime}} {{expirationUnitOfTime}} of the delivery of this email, the link will no longer operate. Please contact your FOLIO system administrator if you are unable to reset your password.

Regards,

{{institution.name}} FOLIO Administration

data.description: Password is successfully created email template

en.body:
{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your Folio account has been successfully created. You should now have access to Folio. 

Should you have any questions or you have received this email in error, please contact your Folio Administrator. 

Regards, 

{{institution.name}} Folio Administration

{{user.personal.firstName}}

Your Folio username is {{user.username}}.

Please contact your Folio Administrator if you have any questions.

Regards,

{{institution.name}} Folio Administration

Dear {{user.personal.firstName}},

Your password has been changed.
This is a confirmation that your password was changed on {{dateTime}}.

Did not change your password? Contact your Folio System Administrator to help secure your account.
	
Regards,

Folio Support

data.description: notifies patron of action that has been taken against a fee/fine

en.header: Action has been taken on a fee or fine charged to your library account
en.body:
{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}

An action has been taken on a fee or fine charged to your library account.
  • Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
  • Title: {{item.title}}
  • Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
  • Call number: {{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}
  • A {{feeAction.type}} transaction has been applied to your account for ${{feeAction.amount}} on {{feeAction.actionDateTime}}, leaving ${{feeAction.remainingAmount}} remaining on the charge.

Library policies and procedures:
  • More information is available at: Checkout privileges & loan periods.
  • Books can be returned to any library or library book drop.
  • Equipment, reserve, and audiovisual items must be returned to the library they were checked out from.
  • Fines/Fees may be paid online.
  • To appeal library fines/fees complete this form.

data.name: action_notice

en.body:
{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}

These items that you have requested are available for pickup.
  • Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
  • Title: {{item.title}}
  • Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
  • Call number: {{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}
  • Item can be picked up at: {{request.servicePointPickup}}
  • Item will be returned to the shelf on: {{request.holdShelfExpirationDateTime}}

Library policies and procedures:
  • More information is available at: Checkout privileges & loan periods.
  • Books can be returned to any library or library book drop.
  • Equipment, reserve, and audiovisual items must be returned to the library they were checked out from.
  • Fines/Fees may be paid online.
  • To appeal library fines/fees complete this form.

en.header: Fines are owed for overdue item(s)
en.body:
{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}

These items that you had checked out were overdue when returned and have incurred overdue fines.

  • Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
  • Title: {{item.title}}
  • Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
  • Call number: {{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}
  • Due date: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
  • A fine in the amount of ${{feeCharge.amount}} for {{feeCharge.type}} has been charged by {{feeCharge.owner}}.

Library policies and procedures:
  • More information is available at: Checkout privileges & loan periods.
  • Books can be returned to any library or library book drop.
  • Equipment, reserve, and audiovisual items must be returned to the library they were checked out from.
  • Fines/Fees may be paid online.
  • To appeal library fines/fees complete this form.

{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}

These items that you have checked out have been recalled and must be returned by the due date listed. If the items are not returned on time, you may owe a substantial fine.

  • Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
  • Title: {{item.title}}
  • Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
  • Call number: {{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}
  • Due date: {{loan.dueDate}}

Library policies and procedures:
  • More information is available at: Checkout privileges & loan periods.
  • Books can be returned to any library or library book drop.
  • Equipment, reserve, and audiovisual items must be returned to the library they were checked out from.
  • Fines/Fees may be paid online.
  • To appeal library fines/fees complete this form.

en.header: Fines are owed for overdue item(s)
en.body:
{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}

These items that you have checked out are overdue and have incurred overdue fines.

  • Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
  • Title: {{item.title}}
  • Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
  • Call number: {{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}
  • Due date: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
  • A fine in the amount of ${{feeCharge.amount}} for {{feeCharge.type}} has been charged by {{feeCharge.owner}}.

Library policies and procedures:
  • More information is available at: Checkout privileges & loan periods.
  • Books can be returned to any library or library book drop.
  • Equipment, reserve, and audiovisual items must be returned to the library they were checked out from.
  • Fines/Fees may be paid online.
  • To appeal library fines/fees complete this form.

en.header: Library items checked out are overdue
en.body:
{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}

These items that you checked out are now overdue and should be returned to the library or renewed, if eligible. If the items are not renewed or returned as stated by library policy, the items will be considered lost and you will be billed for them.

{{#loans}}
  • Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
  • Title: {{item.title}}
  • Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
  • Call number: {{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}
  • Due date: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
{{/loans}}

en.header: Library items checked out coming due
en.body:
{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}

These items that you have checked out will be due soon.
{{#loans}}
  • Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
  • Title: {{item.title}}
  • Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
  • Call number: {{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}
  • Due date: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
{{/loans}}

{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}

The followings items you had checked out are overdue and presumed lost. You are being billed for processing costs as listed.
  • Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
  • Title: {{item.title}}
  • Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
  • Call number: {{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}
  • Processing cost: ${{feeCharge.amount}} has been charged by {{feeCharge.owner}}

Library policies and procedures:
  • More information is available at: Checkout privileges & loan periods.
  • Books can be returned to any library or library book drop.
  • Equipment, reserve, and audiovisual items must be returned to the library they were checked out from.
  • Fines/Fees may be paid online.
  • To appeal library fines/fees complete this form.

{{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}

The followings items you had checked out are overdue and presumed lost. You are being billed for replacement costs as listed.
  • Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
  • Title: {{item.title}}
  • Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
  • Call number: {{item.callNumber}} {{item.enumeration}} {{item.chronology}}
  • Replacement cost: ${{feeCharge.amount}} has been charged by {{feeCharge.owner}}

Library policies and procedures:
  • More information is available at: Checkout privileges & loan periods.
  • Books can be returned to any library or library book drop.
  • Equipment, reserve, and audiovisual items must be returned to the library they were checked out from.
  • Fines/Fees may be paid online.
  • To appeal library fines/fees complete this form.
